link.script: /* CSS Browser Selector v0.4.0 (Nov 02, 2010) Can apply styles to specific browsers, this js adds a class to body tag based on browser Rafael Lima (http://rafael.adm.br) http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ Contributors: http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector#contributors */ function css_browser_selector(u) { var ua = u.toLowerCase(), is = function (t) { return ua.indexOf(t) > -1 }, g = 'gecko', w = 'webkit', s = 'safari', o = 'opera', m = 'mobile', h = document.documentElement, b = [(!(/opera|webtv/i.test(ua)) && /msie\s(\d)/.test(ua)) ? ('ie ie' + RegExp.$1) : is('firefox/2') ? g + ' ff2' : is('firefox/3.5') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_5' : is('firefox/3.6') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_6' : is('firefox/3') ? g + ' ff3' : is('gecko/') ? g : is('opera') ? o + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$1 : (/opera(\s|\/)(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$2 : '')) : is('konqueror') ? 'konqueror' : is('blackberry') ? m + ' blackberry' : is('android') ? m + ' android' : is('chrome') ? w + ' chrome' : is('iron') ? w + ' iron' : is('applewebkit/') ? w + ' ' + s + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + s + RegExp.$1 : '') : is('mozilla/') ? g : '', is('j2me') ? m + ' j2me' : is('iphone') ? m + ' iphone' : is('ipod') ? m + ' ipod' : is('ipad') ? m + ' ipad' : is('mac') ? 'mac' : is('darwin') ? 'mac' : is('webtv') ? 'webtv' : is('win') ? 'win' + (is('windows nt 6.0') ? ' vista' : '') : is('freebsd') ? 'freebsd' : (is('x11') || is('linux')) ? 'linux' : '', 'js']; c = b.join(' '); h.className += ' ' + c; return c; }; css_browser_selector(navigator.userAgent);

form.name: form1

div.span: The Owego Apalachin Central School District is CLOSED through May 15, 2020 by executive order of the Governor of New York.
We will continue to update information as it becomes available here on our website and through the OACSD mobile app. Limited information will be shared on our social media pages.
View OA Remote Learning Plan here:
Next Board of Education Meeting will be Monday, April 27th at 6:30pm. BOE meetings will continue to be live streamed on our
and shared on the BOE page after here:

span.span: Apalachin Elementary School 5th grader, Jewel Belokur, was honored as an Akshar All-Star by Senator Fred Akshar. Jewel was recognized for using her amazing heart to lead by example, always putting others before herself and never being afraid to speak up for others when they need help. Watch the video here:

img.title: NAMM AWARD
img.alt: OACSD EARNS 2020 BEST COMMUNITIES FOR MUSIC EDUCATION DESIGNATION FROM NAMM

div.a: OACSD EARNS 2020 BEST COMMUNITIES FOR MUSIC EDUCATION DESIGNATION FROM NAMM

span.span: designation from The NAMM Foundation for its outstanding commitment to music education for the third consecutive year.
Our Universal Pre-K registration (and lottery if needed) for the 2020-2021 school year has been delayed until Monday, June 1, 2020. Parents/Guardians can still access
and call (607) 687-7307 ext. 7777 to leave a message if you have questions.
If you have a completed registration form that you’d like to submit, it can be dropped in the blue drop box near the OA district office parking lot (5 Sheldon Guile Blvd. Owego, NY 13827).

img.title: model plc
img.alt: OWEGO FREE ACADEMY RECOGNIZED AS MODEL PLC SCHOOL

div.a: OWEGO FREE ACADEMY RECOGNIZED AS MODEL PLC SCHOOL

p.style: color: #222222; font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt
p.span: Owego Free Academy was recently recognized as a Model Professional Learning Community School. OFA is one of only 38 High Schools across the nation to receive this distinction this year.

span.style: color: #000000; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;font-size:13px;font-family:Verdana

p.span: Through a comprehensive application process, we were able to share our story detailing how we implemented PLC structures and processes in order to improve student achievement. One of the most important selection requirements is the ability to show three consecutive years of improvement in student achievement. We were able to do this and demonstrate to Solution Tree that we are a top tier high school in the state of New York.

img.title: picnic sign
img.alt: NEW PICNIC SEATING AREA INSIDE OFA STADIUM CREATED IN MEMORY OF OFA GRADUATE AND LONG-TIME DISTRICT EMPLOYEE

div.a: NEW PICNIC SEATING AREA INSIDE OFA STADIUM CREATED IN MEMORY OF OFA GRADUATE AND LONG-TIME DISTRICT EMPLOYEE

span.span: The new picnic seating area inside Christy J. Valvo Stadium at Owego Free Academy was created through a donation from Toni Jo Katchuk-Richards in memory of her cousin, Jacqueline “Jackie” Sears-Hotchkiss.

img.title: nyssma all state
img.alt: 4 OFA STUDENTS SELECTED FOR NYSSMA ALL STATE ENSEMBLES

div.a: 4 OFA STUDENTS SELECTED FOR NYSSMA ALL STATE ENSEMBLES

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small
div.span: This year Owego Free Academy had 3 students selected to perform at NYSSMA All State and 1 student selected as an alternate. Congratulations, Ashleigh Allen (alto 1), Rachel Raftis (alto 2), Jayden Ripic (French Horn), who will perform with the ensembles, and Emmalyn Saddlemire (alto 1) who is an alternate for the choir.
Address: 5 Sheldon Guile Boulevard, Owego, NY 13827 | Phone: (607) 687-7307
